thread.title: Viewers disgusted as EastEnders' Michelle Fowler beds 17-year-old lover hours after her niece
thread.title_full: Viewers disgusted as EastEnders' Michelle Fowler beds 17-year-old lover hours after her niece

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Viewers disgusted as EastEnders' Michelle Fowler beds 17-year-old lover hours after her niece
text:
Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
EastEnders viewers were less than impressed with Michelle Fowler's behaviour on the Square - after bedding her 17 year old lover hours after he slept with her niece. 
Michelle returned to Walford after fleeing Florida, where she had been living and working, because she had had an affair with her student Preston Cooper, who is 17. 
The age of consent in the states is 18, so it legally means she is a paedophile. 
Michelle hadn’t set foot in Albert Square for 20 years, but made her comeback in the Christmas Eve episode of the soap with a new face, played by actress Jenna Russell who replaced Michelle’s original actress Susan Tully. Preston and Michelle can't keep their hands off each other (Photo: BBC) Preston and Michelle doing that inter-generational smooching thing (Photo: BBC) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
